nodes.text: The Merthia system was located in the Expansion Region's Merthian sector. It shared its name with the Merthian lung infection, a fictitious disease invented at some point during the Galactic Civil War by the smuggler Roark Garnet in order to prevent Tax Inspector Mothra from searching his starship.
The Merthia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-13.
